main event: Multiple witnesses, including a member of the Air Force, reported seeing unidentified flying objects in the sky over New York City on July 7, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were described as glowing, circular, and estimated to be 15-20 feet in diameter,Several sightings involved multiple witnesses observing the same phenomena at different times and locations,The objects appeared to be maneuvering at high speeds and changing directions abruptly,Some witnesses reported observing the objects for several minutes before they disappeared,The case is classified as unresolved and remains under investigation.
witness description: Includes civilians and at least one member of the U.S. Air Force.
